eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Indiana; at 02:04 PM ON JAN 2, 2026 Effective until 02:19 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Indiana EAS System. This test is conducted in coordination with the Indiana Broadcasters as a public service to the citizens of Indiana.
